subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The story of Timofey Mozgov, who signed with the Knicks in July, belies that of a typical player in Russia, which tends to usher top young players to pro teams and coddle them.
snippet: The story of Timofey Mozgov, who signed with the Knicks in July, belies that of a typical player in Russia, which tends to usher top young players to pro teams and coddle them.
